main event: A civilian observed a red and yellow light resembling a pea in size, moving northwest and brightening at times before fading and disappearing on July 25, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as having characteristics similar to an aircraft., The duration of the sighting was approximately 3 minutes., The visibility conditions were clear with a high full moon., The sight was observed from a home through an open window., There are no other reported incidents of this sighting recorded.
witness description: civilians including an attorney and a World War II navigator
